products.name: Balsam
products.description: The Balsam paver is ideal for any driveway application by adding instant curb appeal to your landscape. Complimenting the Balsam slab, this collection can be used in both vehicular and pedestrian applications, allowing for a seamless transition from the driveway to backyard.
